subject: Education
title: The Homework App Trap: When AI Does the Work
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Homework App Trap: When AI Does the Work.

hook.text: Millions of students use AI apps to solve homework instantly. Teachers can't tell the difference anymore.

buildup.text: Apps like Photomath and ChatGPT let students photograph a problem and get a perfect answer in seconds.

discovery.text: Studies show students using these apps get higher homework grades but lower exam scores. They learn less.

twist.text: Some teachers have abandoned homework entirely. Others design assignments that AI can't easily solve.

climax.text: The homework app reveals a deeper question: if AI can do it, should students still learn it?

punchline.text: The app did the homework. The student did nothing.

quiz.question: What happens to exam scores when students rely on AI homework apps?
